# GitHub Configuration

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration and development guidelines.

## Development Standards

- CONVENTIONAL_COMMITS.md - Commit message standards and semantic release configuration
- i-instructions.md - Guidelines for AI collaboration and development practices

## CI/CD Configuration

The CI/CD pipeline is configured in workflows/ and includes:

- Automated testing and building
- Multi-platform releases (Android, Web, Windows)
- Semantic versioning and release automation
- Cache management and optimization

## Issues and Project Management

Feature specifications and development roadmap are tracked in [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/janusmartinlee/trick-or-treat-finder/issues) with proper labeling and prioritization.
